mean_en: connected with a job that needs special training or skill, especially one that needs a high level of education; (of people) having a job which needs special training and a high level of education
sentence: My parents want me to have a professional career—but which profession should I choose?
sentence_trans: 父母希望我步入职业生涯，但是我应该选什么职业呢？
word_etyma: profession职业 + al……的 → professional职业的
